#summary Benchmarks comparing Pandoc to Markdown.pl.

= Pandoc r446 =

This benchmark uses the sources for Allan Odgaard's [http://macromates.com/textmate/manual/ TextMate manual], available at
http://macromates.com/textmate/manual/source.tbz.  The test machine is a
Pentium M 1.4GHz, 1G RAM, running debian linux.  Pandoc was compiled with
the '-O0' optimization flag.

{{{
    roktas@cobalt:~$ du textmate_manual.txt
    176K    textmate_manual.txt

    roktas@cobalt:~$ time pandoc textmate_manual.txt >/dev/null

    real    0m6.006s
    user    0m5.376s
    sys     0m0.020s

    roktas@cobalt:~$ time pandoc --strict textmate_manual.txt >/dev/null

    real    0m6.938s
    user    0m5.724s
    sys     0m0.024s

    roktas@cobalt:~$ time markdown-1.0.1 textmate_manual.txt >/dev/null

    real    0m11.769s
    user    0m10.937s
    sys     0m0.028s


    roktas@cobalt:~$ time markdown-1.0.2b7 textmate_manual.txt >/dev/null

    real    0m23.575s
    user    0m19.581s
    sys     0m2.060s
}}}
